description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程旨在經由對文化經濟學的認知，解讀文化經濟的發展邏輯與運行機制，建構文化經濟知識體系，期能為文化市場與文化產業發展提供理論基礎與思維座標。課程主要內容，一為在經濟邏輯運行下的文化活動，諸如文化產品、文化事業、文化資本、文化產業、文化市場等；另一為經濟活動所反映與體現的文化因素，以及對經濟運行產生作用的思維價值等。
description.en: The course aims through awareness of cultural economics to interpret the development logic and operating mechanism of cultural economy and to construct a cultural economic knowledge system, and is expected to provide the theoretical basis and thinking coordinates for the development of cultural markets and cultural industries.The main content of the course is economic logics underpinned cultural activities, such as cultural products, cultural business, cultural capital, cultural industries and cultural markets; on the other hand, cultural factors reflected and experienced by economic activities, as well as the value of thinking which plays an important role in economic activities.

NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: 近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用Python來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的Python開發者皆將Python作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到Python物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以Python物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉Python物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉Python之特性，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來開發網路前後端程式。
description.en: Recently, many artificial intelligence (AI), network, and embedded system application developers use Python programming language to implement their systems. However, many developers only take Python as a script language instead of using Python’s object oriented characteristics. This class will mainly start from programming Python by the object-oriented way. Students will be required to implement various kinds of assignments to learn the characteristics of Python objects. Besides, students can learn how to apply all kinds of Python application programming interfaces to understand the Python more. In the end of this class, students will be required to develop a network application containing a frond-end client and back-end server to show their achievements.

description.zh: 結晶學已經是成為當今科學研究領域的一門重要知識與技術。至目前為止至少有20位諾貝爾獎得主其貢獻都與結晶學有關。在這課程，我們將闡述結晶學的相關基本知識，例如: 晶格、對稱、原子散射、結構因子及解結構。此外，這門課程也將涵蓋實際操作解結構。所有基礎知識與實作，涵蓋單晶繞射與粉末繞射。也將涵蓋部分蛋白質結晶學的基本知識。
description.en: Crystallography has become an important field in scientific knowledge and technique in physics, chemistry, materials, and biology, which has been recognized by more than 20 winners of Nobel prize. In this course, we will illustrate the fundamental knowledge about crystal lattice, symmetry, atomic scattering, structure factor, and structure determination. In addition, the course also includes practices in structure determination by single crystal x-ray diffraction and powder x-ray diffraction. All fundamental knowledge and practices are mainly in small molecular cases, but part of knowledge of protein crystallography will also be included.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: ◎乙組選修/限30人/機電所、外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 基本或然率，可靠度概念與定義，不確定性分析，可靠度分析之方法，可靠度導向設計，系統可靠度。
description.en: The analyses of structure reliability   Basic,the concept and definition of reliability uncertain analyses, the method of reliable analyses , reliability -orient design , system reliability.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 本課程內容有:1.儀器裝置,應變計原理與使用方法.2.驗証簡支樑之彎曲理論.3.驗證馬克斯維爾反相定理.4.桁架試驗.5.剛架試驗.6.壓構材欴挫屈試驗.7.構材扭轉試驗.
description.en: Introduction: 1.Instrumentation. 2.Simple bending. 3.Maxwell's Reciprocal theorem. 4.Truss. 5.Rigid frame. 6.Buckling test. 7.Torsion test.

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.

name.en: Special Topics on Engineering Information Management

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含ADM 及PDM網圖、要徑分析、PERT分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

description.zh: 隨著衛星資料的取得變得更為容易，衛星遙測在各領域的應用在近年來變得更為廣泛。本課程將從遙測之基本概念開始介紹，接著介紹常用的衛星資料來源，最後本課程將簡介在土木與環工領域的衛星遙測應用。本課程一半以上的時間將為實作，學生將熟習在遙測分析軟體上分析真正的衛星資料，並在學期末遞交對自選主題之一研究報告。
description.en: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

name.zh: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
name.en: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Civil and Environmental Engineering with labs

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體Matlab作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 1.基本觀念, 2.RC主動網路之元件與子網路, 3.具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析, 4.雙極接面電晶體之線性應用, 5.運算放大器之線性應用, 6.網路靈敏度, 7.分解, 結構, 及靈敏度, 8.二階濾波電路之合成與設計, 9.梯形濾波電路之合成與設計, 10.信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

name.zh: RC主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

notes: ◎甲乙組選修/限30人/機電、機械、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 分子模擬是一種廣泛應用在各工程領域的研究工具。針對研究目標的現象及材料，將巨觀尺度的系統映射到微觀尺度，以其組成原子和分子建立模型。模型內的原子則依循力場相互作用，於電腦上高速運算。所收集到的數據，透過統計力學的分析，可預測目標系統的巨觀性質。以此方法得到的資訊，可指引後期實驗開發的方向，以加速研發的進程並減少實驗的浪費。本課程旨在介紹常見的分子模擬理論和技巧，並協助各領域的同學對其專業問題進行實作。
description.en: Molecular simulation provides research guidelines and fundamental understandings for studying engineering problems and designing novel materials. The target material is modelled by a microscopic system which is constructed in the atomistic level. The simulations for such system are carried out on the computers based on the applied force field, and generate information that can be used in the future design. This course introduces the basic theories and tools in modern molecular simulations. Students from different majors can formulate simulation problems based on their expertise and interests.

name.zh: 分子模擬於工程之應用

notes: 工程學院院級選修,大研合開(研究所選此課號)電腦教室

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

notes: ◎丙組選修/陳盈君/機電、機械外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程將講述人體動作分析所需之理論知識及實驗量測設備原理。課程內容包括運動學及動力學基本原理:平移和旋轉、座標系的坐標轉換、尤拉角、線速度、線加速度、角速度、角加速度之求法。動力學著重於利用逆向動力學計算各關節力，力矩和功率。課程中亦將介紹動作分析系統之各項元件及資料處理方法。
description.en: This course introduces the basic theories and the measurement equipments for performing human motion analysis. The course contents will include topics on Kinematics and Kinetics: translation and rotation, coordinate system transformation, Euler angles, linear velocity and acceleration, angular velocity and acceleration, inverse dynamics, joint moment and power. The basic components of human motion analysis system and the data processing methods will also be described.

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 日、職都建所和設計博班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

notes: ◎甲組選修/機電.製科所和機電博班合開/林懷恩

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；人數上限7人，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: 循環經濟是一種與傳統線性經濟（開採-製造-丟棄）不同的產業經濟模式，循環經濟就像自然生態循環一樣，是封閉且循環的經濟系統，透過重新設計產品和商業模式，促進更好的能源與資源使用效率、消除廢棄物及避免污染自然環境。內容將包括發展及應用物質流分析及循環經濟的相關技術，先進材料的循環經濟議題及案例分析，不同高分子材料領域的循環經濟生態，及跨學科創造永續的解決辦法。
description.en: A circular economy is a regenerative system in which resource input and waste, emission, and energy leakage are minimised by slowing, closing, and narrowing material and energy loops. This can be achieved through long-lasting design, maintenance, repair, reuse, remanufacturing, refurbishing, and recycling. This is contrast to a linear economy which is a 'take, make, dispose' model of production. This course, further, contributes to the optimising systems rather than components, or the notion of ‘design for fit’. As a generic notion it draws from a number of more specific approaches including novel material, plastic, polymer, textile, and the cicular economy. Additional benefit to students is learning of Sustainable Development.

name.zh: 循環經濟與高分子工業

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹關於語言、社會與權力之間關連性的基本理論與重要議題。本課程將探討語言如何在社會中運作；媒體、政治與日常生活的語言使用；不同世代、種族、階級與性別語言使用的差異；語言如何影響思考；語言如何影響與建構我們的認同。
description.en: This course introduces students to fundamental theories and key issues about connections between language, society, and power. It examines how language functions in society; language use in the media, politics and everyday talk; differences in language according to age, ethnicity, class, and gender; how it influences thought; and how it affects and constructs our identities. Through readings and class discussion, this course provides students with theoretical ideas and analytical strategies to their research projects.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 莎翁與通俗文化有什麼關係呢？莎翁的作品不是難以理解嗎？欣賞莎翁的作品不需要特別的訓練、時間、與長期的投資嗎？這些問題的答案可以同時是肯定和否定的。不論您喜歡與否，在當代的文化裡，莎翁無所不在。Paul Prescott已經指出：「莎翁的蹤影並不局限於教室、大學、劇場等正式場合，而是在電影、電視、新聞小報、電玩、流行音樂、連環漫畫、及廣告等大眾媒體上到處可見。」確實，莎翁早已是無可迴避的圖像。他的語言文字、人物、劇本情節已經在通俗的大眾媒體上受到廣泛的挪用。「通俗文化中的莎士比亞」是為了有意於為了各種目的而挪用莎翁作品內容之學生，包括以「通俗莎士比亞」作為英語文教材之中小學教師，而設計之英文課程。為了瞭解，甚至挪用莎翁作品內容的複雜性與其中蘊含之永恆不變、舉世皆然的真理，我們將透過電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇等媒介，以異於傳統的反向方式間接研習莎翁作品的珍貴特質與內容，以瞭解社會大眾為了有效達成商業、文化、及政治的目的，是如何挪用莎翁作品。修習本課程的學生亦可推薦有助於未來透過通俗莎翁進行英語文教學之電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇，作為上課教材。
description.en: What has Shakespeare to do with popular culture? Are his writings not difficult and more or less inaccessible? Does it not require special training, time and long-term investment to appreciate Shakespeare? Well, the answer might be yes and no. Like it or not, Shakespeare is everywhere in contemporary culture. As Paul Prescott has pointed out, “His presence is not confined to the ‘official’ locations of classrooms, universities and theatres, but permeates popular mass media such as cinema, television, tabloid journalism, computer games, pop music, comics and advertisements.” Indeed, Shakespeare has long been an inescapable icon. His words, characters, and plots have been widely appropriated to appear across a range of popular mass media. This course is designed to introduce Shakespeare to those who are interested in appropriating Shakespeare for various purposes, including teaching and learning English through what Douglas Lanier has called “Shakespop.” To appreciate the complexit

name.zh: 通俗文化中的莎士比亞

description.zh: 當代英美流行小說,例如:帶珍珠耳環的少女,時空旅人之妻,姊姊的守護者,暮光之城系列等等,主題推陳出新,內容扣人心弦,有的反應當前的文化議題,有的表現出創新的文學想像,在在都激發著同學們閱讀原文小說的興趣.又由於小說的書寫語言為當今英語世界所使用,沒有年代隔閡,所以原文流行小說也是優良的英語學習材料.在字彙,片語,句型,段落及文章結構,到故事情節發展與深入探討主題的每個層面上,都提供了豐富的素材,供同學們學習觀摩.因此,本課程將挑選不同類型之時下英美流行小說四本,每月一本,規劃進度,在課堂上進行導讀與討論,並加強字彙,句型,與文章結構上的分析,幫助同學們在英語書寫,閱讀技巧,跨文化了解與思辨能力上,獲得最大的進步!
description.en: Contemporary popular novels originally written in English, such as the Girl with a Pearl Earring, the Time Traveler’s Wife, and the Twilight, have a strong appeal to readers worldwide, but non-native English speakers often enjoy these works in translated versions or film adaptations. To encourage our students to read these popular English novels in the original language, the instructor will choose four novels of various subject matters and use them as effective teaching materials in the classroom. The objectives are (1) to enrich students’ cultural background knowledge of the English speaking world today, (2) to cultivate students’ life-long reading habit of keeping up contemporary materials, and (3) to strengthen their critical thinking as well as language skills, especially reading and writing, through line-by-line close readings in the context and guided discussions on the narrative structures of the whole fiction.

name.zh: 當代流行小說與英語教學
name.en: Contemporary Popular Fiction and English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

notes: ◎工管所&技職所&管理博班&IMBA&IMFI合開

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"系統化創新"是企業不可或缺的競爭策略及唯一的生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地應用。本課程以TRIZ創新方法為基礎，詳細的介紹系統性創新理論及實務的解題手法及落實創新方法之實務應用，可以很有系統地帶領學生們拓展革新思維，有效及系統化之應用於各種產業。讓學生也有機會應用於生活問題的解決。
description.en: Nowadays, enterprises in the phase of violating competence and decreasing profit. To make it survival, enterprises need to implement a systematic innovation technique, but only few companies really understanding and implement. The aim of this course is based on the applications of TRIZ creative method in detail which including the theory of systematic innovation and application, and also leading students to learn how the TRIZ works, and practice to solve their real life and various industries problems.

name.en: The applications of TRIZ creative method

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

notes: 工管四甲乙和工管所、管理博班合開,限10人

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 這是一門研究所課程，內容包括多元數據分析和高等回歸應用。本課程的目標是確保工業工程與管理領域的研究生能夠解釋、實現和操作幾種不同類型的基本迴歸分析。本課程主要致力於高等迴歸分析。重點是發展一個嚴格的微積分計算及矩陣代數為基礎的最小平方法(OLS) 、違反回歸假設、假說檢定及一般線性模型。此外，本課程的重點是協助學生理解分析技術這部分的領域知識，如:統計的基本概念(描述和推理統計，概率分佈)，簡單線性回歸、多元線性回歸、邏輯回歸及對數線性模型之應用。
description.en: This is a graduate lecture course that covers multivariate data analysis and advanced regression applications for students. The goal of the course is to ensure that graduate students in engineering and management fields are able to interpret, implement, and employ basic regression analysis of several different types of data. The course is primarily devoted to advanced regression analysis. The emphasis is on developing a rigorous calculus and matrix algebra-based understanding of ordinary least squares (OLS), violations of regression assumptions, hypothesis testing, and the general linear model. Also, the emphasis of this course is on the acquisition and understanding of analytical techniques such as basic concepts of statistics (descriptive and inferential statistics, probability distributions), simple linear regression, multiple linear regression, logistic regression, log-linear model.

notes: ◎工管所、管理博班和技職所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: (群組 5)創新與創業管理/北科附工302室

description.zh: 物流管理包含依照顧客需求，由原料地至消費者間貨物與相關資訊有效率的流動與儲存之管理規劃。本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：1.物流管理和策略2.運輸和配送3.保管與包裝4.定單處理5.採購6.物料搬運7.物流成本8.物流服務9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量 11.個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics management includes management planning for the efficient flow and storage of goods and related information from raw materials to consumers in accordance with customer needs. The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2. Transportation 3. Inventory maintenance 4. Order processing 5. Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7. Materials handling 8. Logistics costs 9. Logistics customer service 10. Productivity measurement. 11. Case study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
description.en: The course aims to advance students' knowledge of the physics underlying different applied geophysical methods and how the methods are used for exploration, geotechnics, and characterization.  We will cover the theories and modeling techniques of seismic refraction, seismic reflection, heat flow, gravity, and magnetics methods.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: NONE
description.en: NONE

description.zh: 本課程介紹科技論文寫作與報告，課程內容包括科技論文寫作元素介紹(摘要、介紹、方法、結果、討論、結論)與撰寫方式，文獻搜尋與整理，報告與發表注意事項，以利環境所碩博士生應用於未來論文撰寫與成果發表。
description.en: This class focuses on the Introduction of major elements in technical writing, including abstract, introduction, research methods, results, discussion, and conclusion. Writing grammar, style, and methods to perform literature search and review are also introduced. The main aim of this course is enhancing the ability of graduate students in future thesis writing and research publication.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

notes: 日、職都建所和設計博班合開，課程配合USR日2.4進0.6

description.zh: 臺灣建築史的發展大約可分成受到漢民族影響的傳統建築，以及日本和西方世界影響的近現代建築，本課程主要探究臺灣近現代建築發展的歷程。本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣近現代建築分為三個主題：(1) 臺灣近現代建築的背景、(2) 臺灣殖民時期、(3) 二次大戰之後的臺灣建築。
description.en: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1.全球企業發展的外在環境、2.全球技術突破與創新產業、3.各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP產業建置、5.全球品牌智財市場、6.全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7.創新研發的保護方式、8.協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9.兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10.跨國視野下的法律議題、11.企業智財部門規劃、12.併購與智財授權管理、13.品牌智財的財務價值、14.著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (II)

notes: 限修過專利法專題研究及專利審查基準(I),研一優先

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。
description.en: This course is to achieve the following purposes:(1)	To understand the structure of M&A laws.(2)	To be familiar with M&A practice.(3)	To be fluent in M&A EnglishFor the mid-long term goals, this course is to cultivate M&A lawyer, chief legal officer and financial-economic law judge.

name.en: Intellectual Property in Mergers and Acquisitions

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

notes: 限研二,曾修專利法專題研究與專利審查基準I,II,III

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。

name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

notes: ◎日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生、機電博班和能源所合

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

notes: 日車碩與職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

notes: (群組3) 工業與科技管理/北科附工301室

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 108級碩二必修(台北上課)/ B2國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2班 碩一109級必修(個案寫作或論文寫作2選1)

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：?車牌與門牌數字辨識?人臉辨識?1000種影像分類?辨識9000種物件  ?自動駕駛模擬?嵌入式深度學習演算法?空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:?遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人?對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人?深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

description.zh: 本課程從建築物構築方法、力學原理和材料特性出發，介紹構法和材料的技術發展、演進以及創新應用。內容包括常見工法在材料上的運用，以及先進工法在材料上的突破。培養學生面對不同結構行為的建築物新建與整建課題時，可以有能力選用適當的構法和材料進行設計。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，提升學生在學理與實務上的知識。
description.en: This course starts from building construction methods, mechanics principles and material properties. Introduces the technical development, evolution and innovative applications of construction methods and materials. The content includes the application of common construction methods to materials, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction in materials. Training students to be able to select appropriate construction methods and materials for design when facing the new construction and renovation of buildings with different structural behaviors. Through course guidance and case study, improve students' knowledge of academic theory and practice.

name.en: special topics in construction method and material

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹工商組織心理學各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種工商組織心理學應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解工商心理學的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the industrial and organizational psychology each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of industrial and organizational psychology, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial and organizational psychology main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

name.en: Introduction to industrial and organizational psychology

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，由組織在經營的關鍵作用，課程中以品牌與組織理論探討品牌行銷與組織策略的重要議題。課程內容包含品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、組織文化。身為公司經營者，面對國際多變化環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷與組織經營決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding marketing and organization strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business markets. The topics covered in this class include: brand equity, brand marketing, brand competition, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization culture. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand and organization decisions under the internationalized and changeable environment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹語言研究之重要議題並探討當前研究趨勢，含括主題如下：（一）應用語言學：語用學、言談分析、社會語言學、語料庫語言學、詞彙學；（二）外語教學：第二語言習得、科技與英語教學、內容本位語言教學、多元文化與跨文化英語教學；（三）專業英文研究與教學：科技寫作、企業/觀光/科學/醫療/管理英語、專業英語課程創新設計；（四）翻譯研究：口筆譯理論與實務、口筆譯教學、翻譯與科技、影視翻譯、新聞翻譯；（五）雙語教育：英語授課、學科內容與語言整合教學、雙語教師之養成。
description.en: This course aims to introduce major research issues and current trends in language studies. Possible topics include, but are not limited to, the following: (1) applied linguistics: pragmatics, discourse analysis, sociolinguistics, corpus linguistics and phraseology; (2) foreign language teaching: L2 acquisition/SLA, technology and English education, content-based instruction and multi-/cross-cultural issues in English education; (3)ESP research and teaching: technical writing, English for business/tourism/medicine/technology/management, and innovations in ESP curriculum design; (4) translation studies: theory and practice of translation and interpretation, translation and interpretation teaching, translation and technology, audiovisual translation and news translation; (5) bilingual education and bilingualism: English medium instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL) and bilingual teacher development.

name.en: Issues and Trends in Language Studies
